CHAT.comment: CHAT format needs to be double-checked
screen time is elapsed time from beginning of visit in min:sec

u.a: C is sitting on M's lap
M sets up cups and saucers
M picks up pot and fits a lid on it
M sets pot down; picks up frying pan
M picks up forks and spoons and knives
<bef> C reaches in house and pulls out bed
C looks in house; M gathers up utensils
M reaches in house and holds something up
C puts man on bed; M reaches in house and pulls out woman
C puts lady on other bed
M pulls another person out of house; holds up to C
picks it up and hands to C
C sneezes; can't answer right away
M holds up knife again briefly
M takes spoon out of C's hand
M points at picture on cover of a book
C kind of whines when M touches her stomach; C is still on M's lap
no response from C; looks intently at book
M lifts C off her lap so she stands next to her
<aft> C moves away from the table
<aft> C walks around table; sits in chair on M's other side
M points at picture in book
<bef> M points then C moves her finger to where M is pointing
C's last 2 mumbled responses where not answers to M's questions
